capture-01.png.speaker: Cless
capture-01.png.text: She's doing much better. Her fever is gone. She should be fine in a day or two.

capture-02.png.speaker: Cless
capture-02.png.text: My pendant? The one you gave to me for my birthday? What about it?

capture-03.png.speaker: Chester
capture-03.png.text: Hey, Amy, I'm going hunting today.

capture-04.png.speaker: Amy
capture-04.png.text: Is Cless going, too? Can I come, too?

capture-05.png.speaker: Chester
capture-05.png.text: Sorry, Amy! You're still too young! Be a good girl and wait here for me to come back, okay?

capture-07.png.speaker: Chester
capture-07.png.text: I will! See ya later, sis!

capture-09.png.speaker: Miguel
capture-09.png.text: ...? Isn't that Chester's voice coming from outside...?

capture-10.png.speaker: Cless
capture-10.png.text: Oh, yeah! I almost forgot, I'm supposed to go hunting with Chester today.

capture-11.png.speaker: Miguel
capture-11.png.text: Ah, I see. We'll talk about it over dinner tonight.

capture-14.png.speaker: Miguel
capture-14.png.text: Master Tristan, you're more than welcome to stay here with us as long as you like.

capture-15.png.speaker: Tristan
capture-15.png.text: Thank you kindly, Sir Miguel. I'm glad someone in this house knows how to train rather than

capture-16.png.text: Thank you kindly, Sir Miguel. I'm glad someone in this house knows how to train rather than going to play in the woods.

capture-17.png.speaker: Cless
capture-17.png.text: Sorry I'm late, Chester. Master Tristan came by the house.

capture-19.png.speaker: Cless
capture-19.png.text: Mom, you're still sick! Get back to bed and get some rest!

capture-20.png.speaker: Cless's Mother, Maria
capture-20.png.text: I know.. -cough- I'm just worried. This area just isn't safe anymore!

capture-21.png.speaker: Cless
capture-21.png.text: Mom, Chester is coming with me! We'll be fine!

capture-22.png.speaker: Chester
capture-22.png.text: Don't worry, Mrs. Alvein, we'll be back with plenty of food! You'll need to be rested just so you

capture-23.png.text: Don't worry, Mrs. Alvein, we'll be back with plenty of food! You'll need to be rested just so you can cook it all!

capture-25.png.speaker: Amy
capture-25.png.text: Are you guys going hunting today? You sure you can keep up with Cless, Chester?

capture-26.png.speaker: Chester
capture-26.png.text: Hey, swords aren't the only weapons!
